alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 04 at 1:14PM MST until February 05 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds gusting to around 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Golden Valley, Musselshell and Northern Stillwater. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for light or high profile vehicles and those towing trailers. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts are expected over the higher hills and exposed plateaus.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.
